text:
e="preserve">Aniq Ariffin is an active chess player. He started traveling in the field of chess since the age of 12 after sitting for the UPSR examination. Aniq has participated in many major tournaments.he wants to be a famous malaysian chess Grandmaster.
Biography.
Aniq Ariffin was born in Selangor, Malaysia in 2005. Aniq was helped by his father in fulfilling his needs in the field of chess because chess was his sport and hobby in his life.
